title: Grudge
description: Malice was a broken man. A leader with a cracked crown.Guilt was eroding his throne.William was an opportunist. A man with a grudge.Ambition dressed in an iron suit.Anthony was a survivor. A lover with hope.Healing wrapped in good intentions.I’m a pawn, and it’s up to me to remind these men that they’re stronger together.I just pray that this fight for power won’t tear us all apart.
author: Coralee June
